Look for a simple plug-in model (like from TP-Link or Netgear) that supports your Wi-Fi standard—place it midway between the router and your room, plug it into an outlet, and follow the easy setup via an app or button press. Just check if your facility allows personal devices; if the network is password-protected, you'll need that info to connect it.
